derivation: or עֲבוֹת; or (feminine) עֲבֹתָה; the same as H5687 (עָבֹת);
outline:
1. cord, rope, cordage, foliage, interwoven foliage
    1. cord, rope, cordage, chain
    2. interwoven foliage
kjv_def: band, cord, rope, thick bough (branch), wreathen (chain).
strongs_def: something intwined, i.e. a string, wreath or foliage
